body: For all the people that have a youtube channel or record in general what recording software do you use and what render settings do you use
body_tagged: For all the people that have a youtube channel or record in general what recording software do you use and what render settings do you use
title: Recording Help

replies.body: I've been using trials cuz I'm cheap XP but I used Action! And I'm using camtasia
replies.body_tagged: I've been using trials cuz I'm cheap XP but I used Action! And I'm using camtasia

replies.body: i plan on making a youtube channel and plzz can you guys help me with tips like with recording sofwares you use
replies.body_tagged: i plan on making a youtube channel and plzz can you guys help me with tips like with recording sofwares you use

replies.body: OBS is best for recording and streaming:)
replies.body_tagged: OBS is best for recording and streaming:)

replies.body: I don't like FRAPS or Bandicam but they're not bad, I would recommend Action! as a recording software because it's simple to use, also you're able to record just audio or take screen shots. For rendering or editing I use Cam Studios or Sony Vegas, both are ez and gud. Crack them.
replies.body_tagged: I don't like FRAPS or Bandicam but they're not bad, I would recommend Action! as a recording software because it's simple to use, also you're able to record just audio or take screen shots. For rendering or editing I use Cam Studios or Sony Vegas, both are ez and gud. Crack them.

replies.body:
OBS/FRAPS
-Fraps is good for lower computers OBS for more Core I7 or high I5 id recomend
replies.body_tagged:
OBS/FRAPS
-Fraps is good for lower computers OBS for more Core I7 or high I5 id recomend

replies.body:
Fraps:
+Intel Pentium G3258
+GeForce GPU // Radeon GPU 
+4-8 GB Ram

Action:
+AMD APU
+Integrated Graphics (Radeon Graphics or Intel are fine)
+2-8 GB Ram
